name: Philippe Schnoebelen
content: Philippe Schnoebelen Directeur de recherche CNRS & Professeur attaché ENS Paris-Saclay Selected Publications To Know More Registration is open for the Research School on Discrete mathematics and logic in Luminy (Marseilles), 16-20 Jan. 2023. It is really moving when some research you did 20 years ago is celebrated today. For this I am deeply grateful to the LICS community as a whole. La page (in French) du cours Complexité (L3) nov. 2023---jan. 2024. The ANR-funded BraVAS project on Reachability for Vector addition systems (VAS) and their extensions. Un lien vers le site de la section 6 du comité national (de la recherche scientifique). The Regular Post Embedding Problem. After dreaming about it for many years, Prateek and I finally contributed some sequence to the OEIS, see A228950 and A229954. See also our joint paper about counting the number of congruence classes for Simon's congruence. . Call me partial but I like these papers. My PGP public key. And now some useful information Basic rules and rates for Parisian taxis (includes "where to complain"). Contact Address LSV, CNRS & ENS Paris-Saclay4, avenue des SciencesCS 3000891192 Gif-sur-Yvette, France Office 3U59 Tel. +33(0) 181 875 457 Secr. +33 ??? E-Mail phs꩜lmf.cnrs.fr
